title: 464 8 "A Descendant of the Beast! Little Oars Jr. - Full Speed Ahead!"Transliteration: "Majin no Shison! Ritoru Ōzu Junia Bakushin!" (Japanese:魔人の子孫! リトルオーズJr.驀進！) Katsumi Tokoro Hitoshi Tanaka August 29, 2010(2010-08-29)[12]
transformers_text: 464 8 A Descendant of the Beast Little Oars Jr Full Speed Ahead Transliteration Maj in no S his on Ri toru zu Juni a Baku shin Japanese Jr Katsumi To koro Hitoshi Tanaka August 29 2010 2010 08 29 12 Oars Jr forces his way into the plaza overturning one of the Marine ships and defeating the Giant Unit enabling the White beard Pirates to advance He continues despite Ace's protests that he is too large of a target and recalls the time Ace made him a hat that protected him from the weather Kuma blasts Oars Jr with Ursus Shock Do flamingo cuts off his leg and Moria impales him with Spiky Shadow Lizard causing him to collapse while trying to reach out to Ace
tf_idf_text: descendant beast little oars full speed ahead transliteration maj toru juni baku shin japanese katsumi koro hitoshi tanaka august oar force way plaza overturn one marine ship defeat giant unit enable white beard pirate advance continue despite ace protest large target recall time ace make hat protect weather kuma blast oar ursus shock flamingo cut leg moria impales spiky shadow lizard cause collapse try reach ace
